ssk turn sl1 p16 p2tog 18 sdtches remaining heel turn 64-stitch sock k k20 ssk k1 turn sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k10 ssk k1 turn sl1 p11 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k12 ssk k1 turn s1 p13 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k14 ssk k1 turn s1 p15 p2tog p1 turn 3 sl1 k16 ssk k1 turn s1 p17 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k18 ssk turn s1 p18 p2tog turn 20 sdtches remaining heel turn 72-stitch sock k22 ssk k1 turn sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k10 ssk k1 turn sl1 p11 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k12 ssk k1 turn s1 p13 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k14 ssk k1 turn sl1 p15 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k16 ssk k1 turn s1 p17 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k18 ssk k1 turn s1 p19 p2tog p1 turn sl1 k20 ssk turn s1 p20 p2tog turn 22 sdtches remaining the heel has now been turned you will start working in the round again gusset knit across the 18 20 22 heel flap sdtches unless you have knit the heel in a contrast colour in that case knit 9 10 11 in the contrast colour cut yarn then rea ach main colour and knit remaining 9 10 11 sdtches the rest of the sock is knit with the main colour pick up and knit one sdtch in each of the loops on the edge of the heel flap the exact number of sdtches picked up is not important just ensure that one sdtch has been picked up for each loop on needle 1 make 1 sdtch by inserdng needle 1 front to back to pick up the bar between the last sdtch on needle 2 and the first sdtch on needle 1 place this sdtch onto needle 1 then knit it through the back loop work the 28 32 36 sdtches on needle 1 in pa ern as set on the leg with needle 1 make 1 sdtch by inserdng needle 1 from front to back to pick up the bar between the last sdtch on needle 1 and the heel flap knit this sdtch through the back loop note if using a contrast colour the bar to pick up will from the previous round as no bar is created when the new yarn is added now switch to the heel flap side of the sock pick up and knit one sdtch in each of the loops on the edge of the heel flap knit across the heel flap sdtches then knit all of the picked-up sdtches through the back loop 4 now switch to the top side of the sock purl the first two sdtches together the picked-up sdtch between the heel and top of the sock
